org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.linker

Class DeclarationLinker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.linker.DeclarationLinker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lifecycle

    public class DeclarationLinker
extends Object
implements Lifecycle
    The linker is responsible to bind extension declaration to type declaration. It tracks TypeDeclaration, and reifies them as factory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BundleContext m_bundleContext
      The bundle context.
      private QueueService m_queueService
      The queue service on which we delegate the binding process.
      private ServiceTracker m_typeTracker
      The service tracker looking for TypeDeclaration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeclarationLinker(BundleContext bundleContext, QueueService queueService)
      Creates the linker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object addingService(ServiceReference reference)
      A new type declaration was published.
      void modifiedService(ServiceReference reference, Object service)
      Type declaration cannot be modified.
      void removedService(ServiceReference reference, Object service)
      A type declaration service was withdrawn from the service registry.
      void start()
      When the iPOJO management starts, we look for type declaration.
      void stop()
      When iPOJO stops, we close the tracker.

      • addingService

        public Object addingService(ServiceReference reference)

      • modifiedService

        public void modifiedService(ServiceReference reference,
                            Object service)

      • removedService

        public void removedService(ServiceReference reference,
                           Object service)
